weight: 134 grams (4.7 ounces) WITH battery and SD card
externalmemory: SD/SDHC card up to 32GB (Recommend 16GB Class6 SDHC card)
flash: Auto, Force ON, OFF, Red-Eye reduction, Slow Sync, Pre Flash
connector: USB connector, AV connector, USB AC power adapter
recycletime: As fast as 0.3 seconds (Ext Flash mode, flash on, landscape focus)
shootingmodes: SPY mode, Single shot, Continuous (3pics), Continuous Flash, AEB (bracketing), Album Shot, Burst, Pre-Shot, Couple Shot, Burst 30fps
focusmodes: Auto, AF Tracking, Face Detection, Macro, Super Macro, Infinity
selftimer: Self Portrait, 2 second, 10 second delay, and 10+2 second (2 pictures)
